WorkItem.Description:
I signed the Convert-SqlServerInventoryClixmlToExcel.ps1 using Idera Powershell Plus IDE (a lovely IDE).  But when I run the signed script I get this error:

File C:\Users\bforest\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Convert-SqlServerInventoryClixmlToExcel.ps1 cannot be loaded. A certificate chain processed, but terminated in a root certificate which is not trusted by the trust provider.
At line:1 char:46

Can you provide any insight and recommendations to remediate this issue?

Thanks!

Brandon_Forest@calquake.com

Comments.Message:
Brandon,
Is there a specific reason that you're trying to sign the scripts?

--Kendal
